Reviews.Title: i like it, one buzz kill
Reviews.Author: Mark Fraser
Reviews.Content: phone is great, had no problems using this phone on any network, ofcourse i did my research before buying,one buzz kill is that the phone did freeze on me a couple times after a week of using it, i hadn't even loaded it up with much stuff,i kept it pretty much clutter free, But this was AFTER the android update 4.2.2 so this may be a jellybean glitch, but this was super annoying, however phone was excellent right out of the box, did not take a whole lot of effort to set it up, there are nice little tips that appear on the screen (not a lot) to help you learn and navigate the phone, power, WiFi just to name a couple examples

ProductInfo.Features:
CPU/ Processor : 1 GHz Qualcomm MSM8230 dual-core
Platform/ Operating System : GoogleTM AndroidTM 4.1 (Jelly Bean)
RAM (Processor) : 1GB
Internal Phone Storage : Up to 8GB
External : microSD card, up to 32GB
Primary Camera : 8 megapixel camera with Exmor RSTM for Mobile image sensor
Display Size : 4.3 inches
Talk Time : Up to 8 hours 30 min4 (GSM), Up to 9 hours 6 min4 (UMTS)
Standby Time : Up to 498 hours4 (GSM), Up to 454 hours4(UMTS)
Cellular and Wireless : UMTS HSPA+ 850, 1900, 1700, 2100 MHz GSM/GPRS/EDGE 850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Xperia L C2104 - Unlocked OEM - U.S. Warranty (Black)
